EmailTemplate.name: SpringOne 2GX 2015.SpringOne 2GX 2015 - Featured Speakers 3-30-15
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne 2GX 2015 in Washington DC: Register now for the early bird rate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Registration and Call for Papers Open!
SUBMIT A PAPER NOW! <http://springone2gx.com/>
Call for Papers closes April 30th, 2015
Register now <https://2015.event.springone2gx.com/register> for the early bird rate by June 12th and save $300.00 off a regular conference ticket. Pivotal <http://www.pivotal.io>, in conjunction with the No Fluff Just Stuff Symposium Series, is pleased to present SpringOne 2GX <http://springone2gx.com>, the premier Java event of 2015. SpringOne 2GX is a collocated event covering the entire Spring, Groovy and Grails ecosystems, with lots of Big Data and Cloud content. The conference will be held September 14 - 17, 2015 at the Marriott Marquis in Washington DC.
Marriott Marquis Hotel 901 Massachusetts Avenue NW
Washington, District Of Columbia 20001 USA [map <https://www.google.com/maps/place/Marriott+Marquis+Washington,+Washington,+DC+20001/@38.9036283,-77.0247219,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89b7b792e03c44d1:0xbbfcef3a3f4dfa2>] (202) 824-9200
This is a one-of-a-kind conference for application developers, solution and data architects develop business applications, create multi-device aware web applications, process vast quantities of enterprise data, design cloud architectures, and manage high performance infrastructure. The sessions are specifically tailored for developers using the popular open source Spring IO Projects, Groovy & Grails, Cloud Foundry, RabbitMQ, Redis, Hadoop and Tomcat technologies. Whether you're building mission-critical web or business applications, crunching huge amounts of distributed data, or designing the next killer cloud application, SpringOne 2GX will keep you up to date with the latest enterprise technology.
Featuring presentations delivered by development leads, committers, customers, and published authors, it's the ideal place to obtain critical skills to help you design, build and run tomorrow's software solutions. Plus you'll meet and learn from open source leaders who drive innovation for these technologies.
Featured Speakers
Check our website <http://springone2gx.com> for speaker and session updates, and mark your calendar now!
See you there, The Spring Team at Pivotal <http://www.pivotal.io>
